page.title: 04East Hyde Home Farm -Arable
page.content: In size{Hyde Farm}is{1000 acres,ie.400 {hectares.}The{machinery}in use is as follows:{tractors,combine harvesters, {cutivators, drills and power harrows. The{crops}grown on this mainly arable farm are as follows: {WHEAT:50%}goes for{animal feed; 25% for{milling into bread flour; 25%}is {sold for seed. {BARLEY:75%}goes for{animal feed;}the remaining{25%}is made into{vinegar. {RAPE:}This{seed}is crushed for{cooking {oil, margarine, cosmetics and soap. {SUNFLOWERS:}These are being grown this year as an{experimental crop}to be used for{margarine}and{cooking oil. {SOYA BEANS:}Also an{experimental crop} this year, they will be made into{soya {flour, meat substitute,}and{additional {protein. The{staff}employed on the farm number {4,}plus the{farmer}and his{son.
